scripts.sign-on-device: echo "This doesn't work at the moment." && ts-node ./src/sign_on_device.ts
scripts.export-key: yarn check-key-exists && openssl ec -in key.pem -text -noout -out priv-pub-key
scripts.verify-key: yarn check-key-exists && test -f key.pem && openssl ec -in key.pem -pubout -out lib/pubkey.pem && test -z "$(git status --porcelain lib/pubkey.pem)" && echo "All good!" || echo "Public key changed, are you sure what you're doing is correct?"
